package step1;

public class Task {

	
	public int getSum(int num1, int num2) {
		/********** BEGIN **********/
		
		int sum = 0;
		for (int i = num1;i<=num2;i++)
			sum+=getSum(i);
		return sum;
	}

	private int getSum(int i) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		if (i == 0) return 0;
		return getSum(i/10)+i%10;
	}
}
